title: Let's Roll with Tony Greenhand
overview: Let's Roll features famous cannabis-artist Tony Greenhand catching up with a "weed enthusiast" celebrity in each episode. He then creates a custom smokeable art for them. We see the nitty-gritty and the minute techniques that go into making these unique art-pieces. At the end of each episode, the art is presented to the celebrity, following which Greenhand and the celeb guest smoke up the work.
